title: Silly penalties for client crashing in champion select.
body:
Look this has happened to me more than once, in the beginning of Champion select a pop up comes up and tells me the Maestro has failed to connect and boots me out of the game.
And when i get back in, i go to queue and it says i have a 4 minute penalty for leaving too many games. When in reality my client crashed in 1. This is seriously screwed. 

Is there anything you can do to fix the 'Maestro' or something. Cause it is quite annoying.

replies.body:
Now it happened again. 10 minute wait time. What the fuck Riot.
